data.title: John Marvin Mitchell Obituary 2021
data.meta_description: John Marvin Mitchell, 83, of Singer, LA, passed from this life on Thursday, November 18, 2021.              Those left to cherish his memory are his son, John "Pete" Mitchell an...
data.text:
John Marvin Mitchell, 83, of Singer, LA, passed from this life on Thursday, November 18, 2021.

Those left to cherish his memory are his son, John “Pete” Mitchell and Pat of Singer, LA; daughter, Sandra Smith and Kennis of Singer, LA; brother, Samuel Ferguson and Gloria of Farmville, VA; sister, Debbie Goodrich of Farmville, VA; grandchildren, Melissa and Jeff Wolfe, Charlie Page, Kyle and Tiffany Mitchell, Sara and Zach Royer, Jody and Lynsea Mitchell, Kaitlyn and Tim Stephens, Kennis “Sibo” and Heather Smith, Noah and Tarren Smith, Colton and Brianna Sizemore, Emily Smith; fourteen great grandchildren and a host of nieces, nephews, cousins, family and friends.

He was preceded in death by his loving wife, Mary Rose Mitchell; daughter, Margaret Sizemore; parents, Sam and Mary Jane Ferguson; brothers, Joseph Mitchell, Jr., Donnie Ferguson.

Visitation will be held on Sunday, November 21, 2021 from 6:00 PM to 8:00 PM at Christway Church in DeRidder, LA. Funeral service will be at 11:00 AM, Monday, November 22, 2021 also at Christway Church. Pastor Kennis Smith and Pastor Vic Warrick will officiate the service. Pallbearers will be Kyle Mitchell, Jody Mitchell, Tim Stephens, Noah Smith, Dillan Royer and Kennis “Sibo” Smith. Burial will follow at Havens Cemetery in Singer, LA.
